document.full_text: bobby mcknight knew fire was coming when he saw the pall of white smoke rising into the blue west texas sky april 9 and, within an hour, a 20-foot wall of flame had reached the rancher's fort davis home.
document.title: west texas ranchers lose cattle, livelihood to fires
lines_and_colors: bobby mcknight knew fire was coming when he saw the pall of white smoke rising into the blue west texas sky april 9 and, within an hour, a 20-foot wall of flame had reached the rancher's fort davis home.
